properties.name: server.domain
properties.description: FQDN of the machine hosting the application.

properties.name: http.identity.group
properties.description: UserAgent group identifier for this application.

properties.name: api.host
properties.description: Root URL of the CrossoutDB API.

properties.name: discord.token
properties.description: Discord token to use for the discord bot.

properties.name: bot.prefix
properties.description: Prefix to use for the discord bot.

properties.name: bot.item.graph.duration
properties.description: Default timespan shown in the price charts.

properties.name: bot.item.graph.source
properties.description: URL pointing to the chart generator.

properties.name: i18n.default
properties.description: Default language to use for the application.

properties.name: discord.redirectUri
properties.description: One of the Discord Application's redirect URIs.
